--- pagetitle: "About | Preonath Chondrow Dev" title: "About me" page-layout: full title-block-banner: false comments: false callout-icon: false --- ::: panel-tabset # Bio I am *[Preonath Chondrow Dev](https://hossainlab.github.io/)*. I am the founder of [CHIRAL Bangladesh](https://chiralbd.org/), a non-profit organization dedicated to health research to improve lives in Bangladesh. I am also working as a health data analysis instructor at [cBLAST](https://www.cblastdu.xyz/). I aspire to maximize the quality of life of the human around me by working at the intersection of education, technology, and health research. I am interested in applying modern data science techniques in the context of disease diagnosis and large data analytics for public health while focusing on bridging the gap between computational and experimental laboratories through highly engaging and fruitful collaborations. # Research Interests # Education - **Jagannath University, Dhaka** | Dhaka, Bangladesh
Master of Science in Microbiology | 2019–2020 - **Jagannath University, Dhaka** | Dhaka, Bangladesh
Bachelor of Science in Microbiology | 2016–2019 # Experience ## Research Experience **Founder & Management Lead** \| [Center for Health Innovation, Research Action, and Learning - Bangladesh (CHIRAL Bangladesh)](https://chiralbd.org/) | Dhaka, Bangladesh | (2020 - Present) The Center for Health Innovation, Research, Action and Learning – Bangladesh (CHIRAL Bangladesh) is a voluntary non-profit research organization, resolving to promote interdisciplinary research in the field of health data science, computational biology and genomics. As the Founder & Management Lead at CHIRAL Bangladesh, I established and now lead a pioneering healthcare innovation and research center dedicated to driving positive change in the health sector. Our focus lies in fostering innovation, conducting impactful research, and facilitating continuous learning to enhance healthcare practices in Bangladesh. **Research Intern** \| Health Systems and Population Health Studies Division | [International Centre for Diarrhoeal Disease Research, Bangladesh)](https://www.icddrb.org/) \| Dhaka, Bangladesh \| (February 2022 - June 2022) As a Research Intern in the Health Systems and Population Health Studies Division at icddr,b, I had the opportunity to contribute to impactful research projects focusing on health systems and population health. Working in a dynamic research environment, I gained valuable insights into the complexities of healthcare challenges and solutions. ## Teaching Experience **Instructor** \| [Center for Bioinformatics Learning Advancement and Systematic Training (cBLAST)](https://www.cblastdu.xyz/) \| Dhaka, Bangladesh \| (August 2023 - Present) As an Instructor at cBLAST, I contribute to the advancement of bioinformatics knowledge and skills by designing and delivering engaging educational programs. Through hands-on training and systematic learning, I empower students and professionals to harness the potential of bioinformatics in various scientific and healthcare applications. **Program Lead** \| Research Internship Program | [Center for Health Innovation, Research Action, and Learning - Bangladesh (CHIRAL Bangladesh)](https://chiralbd.org/) \| Dhaka, Bangladesh \| (January 2023 - Present) In my capacity as the Program Lead for the Research Internship Program at CHIRAL Bangladesh, I am responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and impact of the internship program. I play a pivotal role in providing aspiring researchers with valuable learning experiences in the healthcare innovation and research domain. **Teaching Assistant** \| Public Health & Hygiene, Department of Microbiology \| [Jagannath University)](https://jnu.ac.bd/dept/portal/web/microbiology) \| Dhaka, Bangladesh \| (October 2022 - December 2022) As a Teaching Assistant for the Public Health & Hygiene course, I provided vital support to the Department of Microbiology at Jagannath University. I assisted in delivering an impactful educational experience that emphasized public health principles and hygiene practices to aspiring microbiologists. ## Volunteering **Team Member** \| [Bio-Bio-1:: Bioinformatics Research Discussion Group)]() \| Dhaka, Bangladesh \| (February 2017 - June 2019) As a dedicated member of the Bio-Bio-1 Bioinformatics Research Discussion Group, I actively participated in collaborative discussions and initiatives aimed at advancing knowledge and insights in the field of bioinformatics. Through engaging with fellow researchers, I contributed to a vibrant intellectual community focused on bioinformatics research. # Skills **Programming Languages:** Python, R, SQL, Julia, JavaScript; **Data Science:** scikit-learn, PyCaret, Dask, PySpark; **GIS & Remote Sensing:** ArcGIS, Geopandas, Xarray, Giovani, Google Earth Engiine; **Analytics Softwares:** SPSS, PowerBI, Microsoft Excel; **Survey Tools:** RedCap, KoboToolBox, EpiCollect, Google Forms; **Academic Writing Tools:** Microsoft Word, LaTeX, Mendeley; **Bioinformatics:** BioPython, Bioconductor, BioPandas, Galaxy, NGS, RNASeq, ssRNASeq; **Miscellaneous Skills:** UNIX, Version Control(Git), Web Scraping, APIs # Accomplishments ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 2 × 3 x y z 1 a 2 3.6 2 b 1 8.5 ``` ::: ::: :::
